name: Global Trends Portofino Quilt Bedding Set

reviews.name: Global Trends Portofino Quilt Bedding Set
reviews.reviewText: This product is well made, it was delivered early and in good condition. When I opened it and saw the color I realized it wouldn't go in my bedroom. I had to return it.
reviews.title: Well Made...Wrong Color

reviews.name: Global Trends Portofino Quilt Bedding Set
reviews.reviewText: I love this set. I accented it with some turquoise pillows (also from WalMart) and bright flowers in blue vases in a couple of places around the room. The quilt is a nice size and covers the bed perfectly, and it's easy to have a nicely made up look just by pulling the covers up. So happy with it!
reviews.title: Really brightened up my room!

reviews.name: Global Trends Portofino Quilt Bedding Set
reviews.reviewText: We absolutely love our new quilt and shams! The many colors brighten our room and allows us to accessorize with a variety of things. Great weight and washes well.
reviews.title: Portofino Quilt
